APIÂ¶

pynamics.kinematics

This module contains the definitions for classes used to create kinematic trees.

pynamics.dynamics

This module contains the definition of classes that apply forces to kinematic trees.

pynamics.sim

This module contains the definition of Sim, the core Pynamics module for running simulations.

pynamics.visualizer

This module contains the definition of Visualizer, the Pynamics module for visualizing simulations.

pynamics.math

This module contains various mathematical functions used by Pynamics.
